logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Controls how chatty the plugin logs should be. Debug will also show every realtime update payload.

enablePolling.title: Enable Polling Fallback
enablePolling.description: Use periodic polling in addition to the realtime stream. Only enable if your network blocks the Firebase streaming API.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often the accessory should poll the cloud when polling fallback is enabled.

themeSwitches.title: Theme Switches
themeSwitches.description: Optional list of theme names that should appear as stateless switches on each lamp. The plugin will match the names against the official catalog (e.g., "Dancing Ocean").
